info.title: Bank
info.description:
An institution that provides financial services to
individuals and businesses for profit.

individuals and businesses for profit.

sap.graph.Bank.title: Bank

businessIdentifierCode.description:
A code that represents the SWIFT number, a standard format
for business identifier codes (BIC), that identifies the
bank for international transactions.

country.description: The country where the bank is located.

_country.description: The association to the Country entity.

city.description: The city where the bank is located.

street.description: The street where the bank is located.

isActive.description: Indicates that the bank is active.

sap.graph.Bank.description:

individuals and businesses for profit.
